description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Cash_Advance_RepaymentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the transaction is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the transaction will be submitted, otherwise the transaction is saved in draft.

validation.validation: Cash Advance Repayment currency must be either the currency for the business document or the company.

Cash Advance Available Balance is [Cash Advance Available Balance in Repayment Currency]. Repayment Amount must be less than or equal to the Available Balance. Cash Advance Available Balance includes applied cash advance amount on an expense report not fully approved for this worker. Cancel the related expense report or enter a new Repayment Amount.
